text: Climb Knight from the creator of DERE EVIL EXE, DERE Vengeance, and Spooky Pixel Hero AVAILABLE OCTOBER 15 WEBSITE | DISCORD WATCH TRAILER DESCRIPTION​Step into a retro arcade adventure with Climb Knight! Every floor you conquer brings you closer to the top of the global leaderboards. Can you out-climb the competition and reach the "top"? With LCD-style graphics and super simple 1-button controls, Climb Knight is easy to pick up but fun to master. Just avoid traps, scale ropes, and see how many floors you can clear. Perfect for quick gaming sessions or those moments when you just need one more try after a close call! Featuring a 1-bit minimalist aesthetic inspired by classic handheld LCD games, vintage brick game consoles, calculator games, old keypad phones, and the timeless charm of palm computers and early portable gaming devices, Climb Knight blends that nostalgic pixel art charm with the fun challenge of a true high-score chaser. GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS The higher you climb, and the more levels you conquer, the better your high score. How high can you go? HAPTIC FEEDBACK Feel every moment! Satisfying haptic feedback makes every collectible pulse in your hands, while traps and monsters deliver an extra punch when they catch you. UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS Collect and play with multiple pixel art characters as you progress. RETRO FEEL Inspired by the 80s arcade era, with LCD game pixel graphics and chiptune music to match. CHALLENGE FRIENDS Share your high score and challenge your friends to beat it. TEST YOUR REFLEXES Improve your skills and reaction time with every playthrough. CHANGING ENVIRONMENTS The layout, traps, and reality itself shift slightly after each game, making every run feel familiar, yet strangely different. FUN IS INFINITE The fun never stops as you climb higher and higher in an 80s-style arcade game with a modern twist. If you're a retro gaming fan or looking for a quick one-more-try challenge, Climb Knight is packed with endless fun, designed to keep you coming back for more. Ready to test your reflexes and reach new heights? Play Climb Knight today!​ App info is currently processing and/or the app is not yet fully available for sale on the US App Store. 1. Climb Knight
    from the creator of DERE EVIL EXE, DERE Vengeance, and Spooky Pixel Hero



    AVAILABLE OCTOBER 15

    WEBSITE | DISCORD

    WATCH TRAILER


    DESCRIPTION​

    Step into a retro arcade adventure with Climb Knight! Every floor you conquer brings you closer to the top of the global leaderboards. Can you out-climb the competition and reach the "top"?

    With LCD-style graphics and super simple 1-button controls, Climb Knight is easy to pick up but fun to master. Just avoid traps, scale ropes, and see how many floors you can clear. Perfect for quick gaming sessions or those moments when you just need one more try after a close call!

    Featuring a 1-bit minimalist aesthetic inspired by classic handheld LCD games, vintage brick game consoles, calculator games, old keypad phones, and the timeless charm of palm computers and early portable gaming devices, Climb Knight blends that nostalgic pixel art charm with the fun challenge of a true high-score chaser.


    GLOBAL LEADERBOARDS
    The higher you climb, and the more levels you conquer, the better your high score. How high can you go?

    HAPTIC FEEDBACK
    Feel every moment! Satisfying haptic feedback makes every collectible pulse in your hands, while traps and monsters deliver an extra punch when they catch you.


    UNLOCKABLE CHARACTERS
    Collect and play with multiple pixel art characters as you progress.

    RETRO FEEL
    Inspired by the 80s arcade era, with LCD game pixel graphics and chiptune music to match.

    CHALLENGE FRIENDS
    Share your high score and challenge your friends to beat it.

    TEST YOUR REFLEXES
    Improve your skills and reaction time with every playthrough.

    CHANGING ENVIRONMENTS
    The layout, traps, and reality itself shift slightly after each game, making every run feel familiar, yet strangely different.

    FUN IS INFINITE
    The fun never stops as you climb higher and higher in an 80s-style arcade game with a modern twist.

    If you're a retro gaming fan or looking for a quick one-more-try challenge, Climb Knight is packed with endless fun, designed to keep you coming back for more. Ready to test your reflexes and reach new heights? Play Climb Knight today!​
